name: Actually Bearable Meditech.com v1.0
description: Meditech.com is a slew of solid HTML. No CSS is involved at all in the default code. We will attempt to correct this the best we can with custom CSS to help make the site more usable.
additional_info: v1.0 - I hate reading through the "WALL OF TEXT" that Meditech.com hands you within its customer ticketing system. It looks terrible and uses a console-style font by default. Unfortunately, the code is SO basic, that editing it in one place affects the entire page/site on accident. We will do our best to help make the site more viewable, since their web interface was clearly designed by some intern from 1999. I wish I could show you more screenshots, but there's so much personalized information, you'll just want to try it out and see for yourself. I've given blurry image so you can get the gist. Future Plans: We hope to have modifiable color selections for users, as well as better readability on the header area and footers. We mainly focused on getting things easy on the eyes for the main body text.
